Headline: කට වහන් හිටි විමල්ගේ ඇමරිකානු කුමන්ත්‍රණේ එළියට පනී (සිකුරාදා කාටූන්)
News Content: කට වහන් හිටි විමල්ගේ ඇමරිකානු කුමන්ත්‍රෙන් එලියට පනී (සිකුරාදා කාටූන්)

comments.comment: It is pragmatic to realize the country would be never developed under Ranil Rajapaksa regime who bankrupted the country. So a system change is necessary, so NPP is a option. That does not mean they are tarnishing the country.
How many countries in the world have become developed nations after following IMF format.Ranil and his goons will soon learn , lying as a political strategy is no longer practical in Sri Lanka.

Sumith get things straight. IMF is not a development bank. It is the banker of the last resort. When a country is in a dire straits and has no other alternative, it can request ( rather beg) the assistance of IMF. IMF can help you to put your house in order and once you have lifted your nose above water, it is up to you to make sure that you follow the correct and required steps and changes to g to formulate development strategies. It is a fund and not a development bank. It is the World Bank ( the actual name of which is World Bank of Reconstruction and Development). When you are in a would path, the Word Bank and other develi=opment banks such as Asian Development Bank, could come to our help. I am sure Ranil is much more mature and knowledgable in this matter than both you and I. Do not get things mixed up just because all Tom Dick and Harry utter these simplistic jargons. These are for Tilvin Silva and other fellows who have no other motive but to see that Sri Lanka would go down economically so they could grab power. We have to be pragmatists. Just study how India, in 1970, did with IMF aid and salvaged it from its financial problem.
